languages.text: "Блюстители достанут рабочие робы. Оружие возьмем неприметное, спрячем в рюкзаках с инструментами. Это поможет слиться с толпой".
"The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
languages.original_text: "Блюстители достанут рабочие робы. Оружие возьмем неприметное, спрячем в рюкзаках с инструментами. Это поможет слиться с толпой".

traits.locale_text: "The enforcers will get regular work clothes. We will take inconspicuous weapons, hide them in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
"The enforcers will get regular work clothes. We will take inconspicuous weapons, hide them in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
"The enforcers will procure regular work clothes and carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
"The enforcers will procure regular work clothes and carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
"The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
"The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

languages.text: "Die Enforcer werden uns normale Arbeitskleidung beschaffen. Wir werden nur unauffällige Waffen tragen, die wir leicht in unseren Werkzeugtaschen verbergen können. Dadurch werden wir in der Menge nicht auffallen."
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

traits.locale_text: "Die Enforcer werden uns normale Arbeitskleidung beschaffen. Wir werden nur unauffällige Waffen tragen, die wir leicht in unseren Werkzeugtaschen verbergen können. Dadurch werden wir in der Menge nicht auffallen."

languages.text: «Los guardias nos procurarán indumentaria de trabajo. Portaremos únicamente armas que se puedan disimular en los estuches de las herramientas. Así nos mezclaremos entre el gentío».
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias nos procurarán indumentaria de trabajo. Portaremos únicamente armas que se puedan disimular en los estuches de las herramientas. Así nos mezclaremos entre el gentío».

languages.text: 「エンフォーサーが普通の作業着を調達してくれます。道具袋に簡単に隠せるような目立たない武器だけを携行しましょう。そうすれば、群衆の中に紛れ込むことができる」
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

traits.locale_text: 「エンフォーサーが普通の作業着を調達してくれます。道具袋に簡単に隠せるような目立たない武器だけを携行しましょう。そうすれば、群衆の中に紛れ込むことができる」

languages.text: “执法者会为我们准备好普通工人穿的工作服。我们只携带不显眼的武器，把武器藏在工具箱里，这样就能轻而易举地融入人群。”
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

traits.locale_text: “执法者会为我们准备好普通工人穿的工作服。我们只携带不显眼的武器，把武器藏在工具箱里，这样就能轻而易举地融入人群。”

languages.text: « Les prévôts nous fourniront des vêtements de travail. Nous n'emporterons que des armes discrètes et faciles à cacher dans nos sacoches à outils. Cela nous aidera à nous fondre dans la foule. »
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."

traits.locale_text: Les prévôts nous fourniront des vêtements de travail. Nous n'emporterons que des armes discrètes et faciles à cacher dans nos sacoches à outils. Cela nous aidera à nous fondre dans la foule. »

languages.text: "İnfazcılar, bizim için günlük iş kıyafetleri ayarlayacak. Yalnızca alet çantamızda rahatlıkla gizleyebileceğimiz, dikkat çekmeyen silahlar taşıyacağız. Bu da kalabalığın içine karışmamıza yardımcı olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "The enforcers will procure regular work clothes for us. We will carry only inconspicuous weapons that we can hide easily in our tool bags. It will help us blend in with the crowd."
